edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.common
Class STARTS

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.common.STARTS
public class STARTS
extends java.lang.Object

A "constants container" class holding constants related to STARTS. When talking about the STARTS namespace, or formatting dates as per the STARTS standard, use the values stored here. This minimizes the impact of change, should any of these values change.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String NAMESPACE_NAME
          The name of the STARTS XML namespace: currently "starts"
static java.lang.String NAMESPACE_VALUE
          The URL of the STARTS XML namespace: currently "http://www.cs.columbia.edu/~dli2test/STARTS/"
static java.lang.String SDLIP_DTD_URL
          The default URL for the SDLIP DTD
static java.text.SimpleDateFormat STANDARD_DATE_FORMAT
          A java.text.SimpleDateFormat for formatting dates the way STARTS specifies.
static java.lang.String STANDARD_DATE_PATTERN
          The String describing to java.text.SimpleDateFormat how STARTS dates should be formatted.
static java.lang.String STARTS_DTD_URL
          The default URL for the STARTS DTD

, clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

STANDARD_DATE_FORMAT

public static final java.text.SimpleDateFormat STANDARD_DATE_FORMAT
A java.text.SimpleDateFormat for formatting dates the way STARTS specifies. Use this, rather than constantly reinstantiating one.
